kpi.name: M389B2C2

kpi_info.title: How many times the codecs used in the MSS per termination at MSS level
kpi_info.use: This counter shows how many times the codecs used in the MSS per termination at MSS level. The counter is updated when the MSS assigns a codec to a termination in the MGW.

kpi.kpi_alias: How many times the codecs used in the MSS per termination at MSS level
